name: Your Space
description:
//THIS IS NOT A HORROR GAME\\

**You may have performance issues if you run it on Chrome. Microsoft Edge ran smoothly if Chrome does not work for you**

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

As you get closer to an item, the clicks will become faster. If you move further, they will grow slow. In the end, the volume will determine your distance from the item (the louder it is, the closer you are). The timer counts down from 60 to indicate when the space consumes you. Hit Space to try again.
You are in Your Space. You must find Your Things: books, a game console, and art supplies. Only then can you contact the outside space, but is it even what you want?

Resources Used:
Phone Sound: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/old-phone-sound
Music: Me
